description: For each pair of statements, choose the one that best describes you. Your result will be calculated based on your answers.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I have a natural talent for influencing people.
I am not good at influencing people.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: Modesty doesn't become me.
I am essentially a modest person.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I would do almost anything on a dare.
I tend to be a fairly cautious person.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: When people compliment me I sometimes get embarrassed.
I know that I am good because everybody keeps telling me so.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: The thought of ruling the world frightens the hell out of me.
If I ruled the world it would be a better place.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I can usually talk my way out of anything.
I try to accept the consequences of my behavior.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I prefer to blend in with the crowd.
I like to be the center of attention.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I will be a success.
I am not too concerned about success.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I am no better or worse than most people.
I think I am a special person.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I am not sure if I would make a good leader.
I see myself as a good leader.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I am assertive.
I wish I were more assertive.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I like to have authority over other people.
I don't mind following orders.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I find it easy to manipulate people.
I don't like it when I find myself manipulating people.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I insist upon getting the respect that is due me.
I usually get the respect that I deserve.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I don't particularly like to show off my body.
I like to show off my body.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I can read people like a book.
People are sometimes hard to understand.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: If I feel competent I am willing to take responsibility for making decisions.
I like to take responsibility for making decisions.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I just want to be reasonably happy.
I want to amount to something in the eyes of the world.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: My body is nothing special.
I like to look at my body.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I try not to be a show off.
I will usually show off if I get the chance.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I always know what I am doing.
Sometimes I am not sure of what I am doing.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I sometimes depend on people to get things done.
I rarely depend on anyone else to get things done.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: Sometimes I tell good stories.
Everybody likes to hear my stories.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I expect a great deal from other people.
I like to do things for other people.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I will never be satisfied until I get all that I deserve.
I take my satisfactions as they come.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: Compliments embarrass me.
I like to be complimented.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I have a strong will to power.
Power for its own sake doesn't interest me.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I don't care about new fads and fashions.
I like to start new fads and fashions.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I like to look at myself in the mirror.
I am not particularly interested in looking at myself in the mirror.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I really like to be the center of attention.
It makes me uncomfortable to be the center of attention.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I can live my life in any way I want to.
People can't always live their lives in terms of what they want.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: Being an authority doesn't mean that much to me.
People always seem to recognize my authority.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I would prefer to be a leader.
It makes little difference to me whether I am a leader or not.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I am going to be a great person.
I hope I am going to be successful.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: People sometimes believe what I tell them.
I can make anybody believe anything I want them to.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I am a born leader.
Leadership is a quality that takes a long time to develop.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I wish somebody would someday write my biography.
I don't like people to pry into my life for any reason.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I get upset when people don't notice how I look when I go out in public.
I don't mind blending into the crowd when I go out in public.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I am more capable than other people.
There is a lot that I can learn from other people.

questions.question: Which statement best describes you?
options: I am much like everybody else.
I am an extraordinary person.

results.title: Your Narcissism Score

score_description.text: Low narcissistic traits. You tend to be modest and avoid self-centered behavior.
Moderate narcissistic traits. You may have a healthy level of self-esteem but also value othersâ€™ perspectives.
High narcissistic traits. You likely see yourself as special and enjoy being the center of attention.
Very high narcissistic traits. You may have strong leadership tendencies but could struggle with empathy.

results.disclaimer: This test is not a diagnostic tool. For a full psychological assessment, consult a licensed professional.
